skills.title: SQL JOIN - Basic Syntax
skills.code:
SELECT a.*, b.column_name FROM table_a a
INNER JOIN table_b b ON a.id = b.a_id
WHERE a.date > '2024-01-01'
ORDER BY a.created_at DESC
skills.description: Learn how to perform INNER JOINs to combine data from multiple tables efficiently. This example joins two tables and filters by date.

skills.title: SQL GROUP BY & AGGREGATE
skills.code:
SELECT
  category,
  COUNT(*) as total_count,
  AVG(amount) as average_amount,
  MAX(amount) as max_amount
FROM sales
GROUP BY category
HAVING COUNT(*) > 10
ORDER BY total_count DESC
skills.description: Master GROUP BY clauses with aggregate functions to summarize data by categories.
